data.title: Société Générale
data.meta_description: All the Group's locations around the world.
data.text:
Societe Generale, one of Europe's leading financial services groups and a major player in the economy for over 150 years, supports 25 million clients every day with 126,000 staff in 65 countries.

Find out which of our businesses are present in your country.
